summary: A simple mod that adds some objects like golden candlesticks, statues of Dibella , military documents etc. to 40+ locations.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]More Things To Steal
[/size][i]Make stealing more profitable! 


[/i][u][size=4]Description[/size]

[/u]This mod adds some objects like golden candlesticks, statues of Dibella , military documents etc. (see images) to 40+ locations. All of them are hand-placed, to make sure its not to easy. It also increases the value of some silver things like plates. 
Look for notes to get hints about locations where you can break in. I also locked some doors for example the jarls chambers, to make it more realistic. 


[u][size=4]Installation[/size]
[/u]
Just drag the .esp file in your data folder. 


[size=4][u]Compatibility

[/u][/size]Should be compatible with all mods. I played it with 150+ mods - no problem. 


P.S.
If you run into any problems or have suggestions, please leave a comment. And have fun!
author: skoomaface
